page.title: 17FOOD SHOPPING IN SWINDERBY.
page.content: There is a small {Mace Food Market and another small village shop called Mac's. They are both situated on the High Street. {Mac's}has two counters, one contains a refrigerator. The owner serves her customers with sweets,fruit, household goods,cooked meats, vegetables, drinks and groceries from behind the counter. Outside there is a sweet machine. The Fish and Chip van starts from here. The village also has {mobile vans selling pet food, green groceries, meat and ice cream with video hire. {Milk}in pint bottles is delivered to all the houses everyday except Sundays and Christmas Day.There are 3 types of milk availiable: pasturised,lowfat and sterilised. They also deliver eggs, potatoes,butter,cream and soft drinks. The milkman, his wife and assistant deliver the goods by van and trailer.
